Wedding Bells For Two Popular Celebrity Couples And More From The World Of Entertainment!
According to a DNA report, Ranveer and Deepika's wedding ceremonies will take place between November 12 to 16 and they will exchange vows on November 13.
According to a TOI report, the couple is planning a 3-day wedding function from 30th November to 2nd December in Jodhpur. Reports claim that it was Nick's decision to choose Jodhpur as their wedding destination.
via GIPHY
Celebrating 20 years of Kuch Kuch Hota Hai’s release, Shah Rukh Khan quipped how he still hasn’t understood the script of the movie. “I never listen to scripts, I listen to the heartbeats of the people I work with at times millennial chat with me and say things like why you let go of that script that was such a great script. Till date, I never understood a script. And I can say this with confidence that I never understood the script but the script maker or the filmmaker,” he told IANS.

She laughed it off and asked a counter question, “And if Aman was not played by Salman then what? She further added, “Salman was a beautiful character and yes in a way Rahul(SRK) was selfish”.
Pictures of Ranbir and Alia hanging out in New York is doing the rounds on the internet and it's safe to assume that she is being a supportive girlfriend.
On the professional front, Ranbir will be next seen in Ayan Mukherji’s Brahmastra, which will also star Amitabh Bachchan, Alia Bhatt, Nagarjuna, and Mouni Roy. Alia, on the other hand, is juggling between Kalank and her brand endorsements. Here are the pictures that are floating on the internet.
